definition: variant of 匯編|汇编[hui4 bian1]
to weave/to plait/to organize/to group/to arrange/to edit/to compile/to write/to compose/to fabricate

sentences.english: In assembly language, this is handled explicitly by the programmer.
sentences.chinese: 而在彙編語言中，卻需要程序員來顯式處理。

sentences.english: The software is mainly programmed by C-Language, and partly by built-in Assembler-Language.
sentences.chinese: 系統軟件以C語言爲主體，結合內嵌彙編語言。

sentences.english: Assemble the files and remove the entry from the list.
sentences.chinese: 彙編文件並從列表中刪除條目。

sentences.english: The album was compiled from live recordings from last year's tour.
sentences.chinese: 這套唱片選輯由去年巡迴演出的實況錄音彙編而成。

sentences.english: This assembly language output listing is useful as a debugging aid.
sentences.chinese: 這種彙編語言輸出表是支持調試的有用工具。

sentences.english: Its theory and practice have been codified in the canon of Leninism.
sentences.chinese: 它的理論和實踐都根據列寧主義原則進行彙編整理。

sentences.english: Countries use it to compile basic health statistics and to monitor health spending.
sentences.chinese: 國家用其彙編基本衛生統計和監測衛生支出。

sentences.english: The book is a shapeless mass of contradictory rough drafts.
sentences.chinese: 那本書是一堆自相矛盾的草稿的彙編。

sentences.english: NET assemblies and shows design quality metrics.
sentences.chinese: NET彙編和展示設計質量度規。

sentences.english: The method to generate assemblers by syntax-directed translation is proposed.
sentences.chinese: 提出了語法制導翻譯用於自動構造彙編程序的方法。

sentences.english: Such code must usually be written in assembly language. Contrast with processor-independent.
sentences.chinese: 一些代碼必須用彙編語言編寫。

sentences.english: Good skills of the C-language and assembly languages.
sentences.chinese: 熟練掌握C語言和彙編語言。

sentences.english: Then, break the execution and find the assembly code representing the infinite loop.
sentences.chinese: 然後，中斷執行並找到表示該無限循環的彙編代碼。

sentences.english: In my opinion the best tools to analyse such binaries are Interactive Disassemblers or CPU emulators .
sentences.chinese: 在我看來是交互式反彙編器或CPU模擬器。

sentences.english: Most processor-specific functions must be written in assembly language.
sentences.chinese: 大多數處理器相關的功能必須用彙編語言編寫。

sentences.english: Suppresses the disassembly progress indicator pop-up window.
sentences.chinese: 取消反彙編進度指示器彈出窗口的顯示。

definition: to annotate/to add marginal comments on/criticism/marginalia
Ji Yun (1724-1805), Qing Dynasty writer, author of supernatural novel Notes on a Minutely Observed Thatched Hut 閱微草堂筆記|阅微草堂笔记
